welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Miami Lakes! Get ready to experience the vibrant energy of this city known for its beautiful lakes, sunny beaches, and lively culture. Take in all the charm Miami Lakes has to offer and enjoy your stay here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
